author: samisa
msg: Added 1.0.x branch to facilitate future bug fix backports

author: mturyn
msg: Keep headers from overflowing into the headerDiv if it extends beyond the heard table (in order to fill the space above a vertical scrollbar).

author: hansbak
msg: the facility inventory list is very slow when there are a lot of products in inventory. With 15000 products, the system crashes and run out of memory. This update is a refactoring so that the inventory quanties are only retrieved for the products which are on screen. Previously this was done for all products which were in inventory. Work from my employee Wisut (same as trunk rev:537084)
